API.Comments: Creates a piped writer that is not yet connected to a piped reader.
Creates a piped writer connected to the specified piped reader.
Closes this piped output stream and releases any system resources associated with this stream.
Connects this piped writer to a receiver.
API.Function: write(char[] cbuf, int off, int len)

API.Comments: Flushes this output stream and forces any buffered output characters to be written out.
